MediaRecorderStream.summary: The stream read-only property of the interface returns the stream that was passed into the constructor when the MediaRecorder was created.

remarks.para:
-Using the MediaStream Recording API
-Web Dictaphone: MediaRecorder +
getUserMedia + Web Audio API visualization demo, by Chris Mills (source on GitHub.)
-simpl.info MediaStream Recording demo, by Sam Dutton.
-

MediaRecorderStream.value: The passed into the MediaRecorder() constructor when the MediaRecorder was originally created.
